Your Journey Abroad, Made Simple

StudyNest connects international students with trusted local service vendors for everything you need – from visa assistance to housing, transportation, and beyond.

Why Choose StudyNest?

We're dedicated to making your international student experience seamless.

Verified Vendors

All our service providers are thoroughly vetted and verified for your safety.

Fast & Easy

Get services delivered quickly with our streamlined process.

24/7 Support

Our support team is always available to help you with any questions.

Popular Services

Most requested services by international students.

Legal

Student Visa Assistance

Complete visa application support including document preparation, form filling, interview preparation, and embassy appointment scheduling. Our experts ensure your application is error-free and submitted on time.

Airport Pickup Service
